languages.text: "Авель же... Для него было великой радостью окончание нашего плена в изоляции. Теперь речь Фантазии вновь открыта нам и льется свободно".
"As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."
languages.original_text: "Авель же... Для него было великой радостью окончание нашего плена в изоляции. Теперь речь Фантазии вновь открыта нам и льется свободно".

traits.locale_text: "As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."

traits.locale_text: "As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."

traits.locale_text: "As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “至于亚伯……我们的囚禁终于结束了，这让他感到了难以言喻的喜悦。如今，想象再次向我们敞开了心扉，畅通无阻。”
languages.original_text: "As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."

traits.locale_text: “至于亚伯……我们的囚禁终于结束了，这让他感到了难以言喻的喜悦。如今，想象再次向我们敞开了心扉，畅通无阻。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «En cuanto a Abel... El fin de nuestro cautiverio e aislamiento le trajo una gran alegría. Ahora, las palabras de Imaginación vuelven a nosotros y fluyen libremente».
languages.original_text: "As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a Abel... El fin de nuestro cautiverio e aislamiento le trajo una gran alegría. Ahora, las palabras de Imaginación vuelven a nosotros y fluyen libremente».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「アベルについては…我らの孤立した状態での虜囚が終わったことは、彼に大きな喜びをもたらした。今、想像の言葉は再び私たちに開かれ、自由に流れている」
languages.original_text: "As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."

traits.locale_text: 「アベルについては…我らの孤立した状態での虜囚が終わったことは、彼に大きな喜びをもたらした。今、想像の言葉は再び私たちに開かれ、自由に流れている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Und was Abel angeht ... Das Ende unserer Gefangenschaft in der Isolation brachte ihm große Freude. Nun steht uns die Sprache der Imagination wieder offen und fließt frei."
languages.original_text: "As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."

traits.locale_text: "Und was Abel angeht ... Das Ende unserer Gefangenschaft in der Isolation brachte ihm große Freude. Nun steht uns die Sprache der Imagination wieder offen und fließt frei."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Quant à Abel... La fin de notre captivité en isolement fut pour lui une grande source de joie. Nous avons à nouveau accès au discours de l'Imagination, qui s'écoule librement. »
languages.original_text: "As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à Abel... La fin de notre captivité en isolement fut pour lui une grande source de joie. Nous avons à nouveau accès au discours de l'Imagination, qui s'écoule librement. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."

languages.text: "Abel'e gelirsek... İzole tutsaklığımızın sona erişi onu çok mutlu etti. Hayal Gücü'nün konuşmaları bize yeniden açıldı, o da artık özgürce akıyor."
languages.original_text: "As for Abel... The end of our captivity in isolation brought him great joy. Now Imagination's speech is open to us again, and is flowing freely."

traits.locale_text: "Abel'e gelirsek. İzole tutsaklığımızın sona erişi onu çok mutlu etti. Hayal Gücü'nün konuşmaları bize yeniden açıldı ve özgürce akıyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
